hooks.name: gk/gravityview/dashboard-views/view/before
hooks.description: Triggers before the View is rendered.

hooks.name: gk/gravityview/dashboard-views/admin-menu/icon-url
hooks.description: Controls the icon URL of the top-level Dashboard Views menu.

parameters.name: icon_url
parameters.description: The URL to the icon to be used for this menu. Pass a base64-encoded SVG using a data URI, which will be colored to match the color scheme. This should begin with 'data:image/svg+xml;base64,'. Pass the name of a Dashicons helper class to use a font icon, e.g. 'dashicons-chart-pie'. * Pass 'none' to leave div.wp-menu-image empty so an icon can be added via CSS.

hooks.name: gk/gravityview/dashboard-views/admin-menu/position
hooks.description: Controls the position of the top-level admin menu.

hooks.name: gk/gravityview/dashboard-views/admin-menu/submenu-prefix
gk/gravityview/dashboard-views/admin-menu/submenus
gk/gravityview/dashboard-views/view-editor/settings
hooks.description: Modifies the list of settings to render inside the Dashboard Views View editor tab.

hooks.name: gk/gravityview/dashboard-views/view
gk/gravityview/dashboard-views/view/field/visibility
hooks.description: Sets the View's field visibility (hidden or not).

hooks.name: gk/gravityview/dashboard-views/view/output
gk/gravityview/dashboard-views/view/template
